citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on
18-Nov-19. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone after arriving at the facility. The licensee indicated she
was away and would not be back for several hours.
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm  on
18-Nov-19.  The inspector contacted the licensee by phone after arriving at the facility.  The licensee indicated she
was away and would not be back for several hours.  
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.
